name: The Orb (oddlyfunctional)
description:
There are bad days, and then there are experimental-weapon-goes-bananas-at-your-lab-assistant-job days.

Try escaping the lab without killing anyone! It won't be easy though, there are multiple "power ups" found around that can be less than helpful.

CONTROLS:

  • W: up
  • A: left
  • S: down
  • D: right
